mapper.insert: insert into yun_dk_file_delete (id, old_id, file_name, file_suffix, file_type, employee_id, file_size, folder_id, folder_code, file_path, status, delete_type, action_employee_id, action_employee_ip,action_admin_id ,absolute_path ,create_admin, create_time, update_admin, update_time, encrypt_status, encrypt_key, server_code ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oldId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{folderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deleteType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actionEmployeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actionEmployeeIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{actionAdminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{absolutePath}, #{createAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{encryptStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{encryptKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update yun_dk_file_delete
old_id = #{oldId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_suffix = #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
folder_id = #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
folder_code = #{folderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
delete_type = #{deleteType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
action_employee_id = #{actionEmployeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
action_employee_ip = #{actionEmployeeIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
action_admin_id = #{actionAdminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
absolute_path = #{absolutePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_admin = #{createAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_admin = #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update yun_dk_file_delete set action_admin_id = #{actionAdminId}, status = #{status} where old_id = #{oldId}
update yun_dk_file_delete set action_admin_id = #{actionAdminId}, status = #{status} where delete_type = #{deleteType}
mapper.select:
select ,e.employee_name,e2.employee_name as admin_name from yun_dk_file_delete t left join yun_cp_employee e on e.id = t.employee_id left join yun_cp_employee e2 on e2.id = t.action_admin_id where 1 = 1
order by t.update_time desc limit #{pageStart},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from yun_dk_file_delete t left join yun_cp_employee e on e.id = t.employee_id left join yun_cp_employee e2 on e2.id = t.action_admin_id where 1 = 1
